{"title": "Toy Balls!", "title_search": "toy balls", "title_keyword": "toy balls", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/toy-balls/", "summary": "In the world of Toy Balls!, balls move and roll across a wooden universe with electro zappers lying in wait to toast and zap the innocent balls. Save them by chaining as many balls as possible, in this addictive and innovative game.  Combining intuitive game play, unique ball physics, tricky level puzzles, and crystal clear visuals, Toy Balls! is your perfect fix for hours and hours of endless fun and entertainment!  PRESS QUOTES  “This game kicks ass!” — Touch Arcade forum  “Toy Balls! is very addicting and hard to put down once you start. I dare say that is has the charm of Tetris and is just as addicting and challenging.” — The Gamer with Kids  “When Bejeweled Met Luxor…” — Nine Over Ten  “Truly innovative and endlessly replayable—the best match three game we’ve seen in ages.” — Best Kids Apps  “We wholeheartedly recommend this app to you” — App Picker  “Its levels of innovation in introducing physics to the match-three genre, along with its unique and challenging stage designs, make Toy Balls! a highly recommended puzzler for the iOS platform.” — Jamie Skelton, Associated Content from Yahoo!  SAVE YOUR BALLS!  Toy Balls! combines realistic ball physics with simple, yet accurate, game controls. Swipe your finger across 3 or more balls of the same kind to save them and gain points. It’s that easy to learn and play!  The more balls saved, the more will fall in, pushing them closer to the electro zapper. Think about their physical properties before you chain them. Certain balls will bounce more, while others weigh more, therefore affecting the game play. Every level has different obstacles and electro zappers. It is not always easy to save your balls!  BE A 3-STAR PLAYER  Depending on your score at each level, you are awarded up to three stars. In some levels this is easy, in others it is deviously difficult, so you will have to use your head and skills to collect as many stars as you can. Always remember that the longer the chain, the higher the scores and achievements obtained. And, who knows, by maximizing your score you may unveil a well-kept secret in the future!   SPREAD OUT YOUR SCORE & ACHIEVEMENTS  Players can see how their scores compare with others throughout the world via online leaderboards and achievements in Game Center.  There all multiple leaderboards. One of them corresponds to your total score, while others refer to scores of individual levels.  There are loads of achievements waiting for you to fulfill. Some of them are dead easy, while others are difficult, so you will have to work hard to collect as many achievements as possible.  KEY FEATURES  * Innovative game concept  * Amazingly fluid and realistic physics  * Rescue three or more balls by swiping through them  * Dozens of balls are onscreen, with more added every second  * Eight different types of balls, each with its own mass and elasticity  * Intuitive and super easy to pick up controls  * Easy and straightforward learning process with in-game tutorial  * Levels may be played over and over to reach a new high score for that puzzle  * Balls bounce, slide, collide, rotate, and roll through wooden mechanical mazes  * Rescue balls as quickly as possible to prevent any ball falling into the electro zapper  * 30+ fun and challenging levels with a smooth difficulty curve  * Game Center leader boards & achievements  * Retina display support for the iPhone 4  * Multiple music themes  * Frequent level pack updates", "genre": ["Action"], "metascore": 0, "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2010-12-17", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-178691-17.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-178691-17.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": null, "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": ["IMS SA (Publisher)", "IMS SA (Developer)"], "platforms": ["iOS (iPhone/iPad)"], "rating": null}

{"title": "Orb Wars", "title_search": "orb wars", "title_keyword": "orb wars", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/orb-wars/", "summary": "Bubble Wars / Orb Wars 2.0 is two similar games in one.  In the Attack mode, shoot colored bubbles at a spinning circle and try to shrink it.  If you get 3 or more colors in a row the bubbles are destroyed.  Otherwise the circle can grow.  Once it is large enough to hit you the game ends.In the Defend mode, shoot colored bubbles at a spinning ring of bubbles that surrounds you.  If you get 3 or more colors in a row the bubbles are destroyed.  Otherwise the ring can start shrinking around you.  Once it reaches you the game ends.How to play:Simply shoot bubbles, trying to get 3 or more bubbles of the same color next to each other.  Try to finish a level to go to the next, where you get more points for each destroyed bubble.  At the beginning, try to reduce the number of bubbles by destroying three or more at a time.  When their number has decreased, aim to remove bubbles of the same color.  Once all bubbles of a certain color are gone, the color won't come back, make it easier to remove bubbles of the remaining colors.Each bubble is worth 1 point times the level you're playing so the higher the level, the more points you earn.  However the higher the level, the more bubbles that can fall and the number of colors also increases.Each game (Attack & Defend) uses the Game Center and maintains its own high score so you can know how well you did.In the two player mode, a bubble of each color floats away and lands on the screen of the other player.  Game Center also tracks how many others you've defeated or been defeated by in the two player mode.  Two player modes cane against friends (using Bluetooth) or against random players (using Game Center).  Two player games do not end, the other player scores a win for each time the other player "loses".Advanced tips:You can not really throw away bubbles you do not need.  If a bubble leaves the screen, it will come back the next time bubbles are added.  Because of this, make sure you do not throw away bubbles unless you really have to.  Or unless you are sure you can finish the level before the bubbles come back. Thanks for playing Bubble Wars / Orb Wars 2.0!This application includes fonts created by Dan Zadorozny.  This application includes sound effects created by DJ Griffin and Iwan Gabovitch.", "genre": ["Action"], "metascore": 0, "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2010-09-12", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-165722-17.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-165722-17.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": null, "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": ["Modular Dreams Inc (Developer)", "Modular Dreams Inc (Publisher)"], "platforms": ["iOS (iPhone/iPad)"], "rating": null}

{"title": "LEGO Creationary", "title_search": "lego creationary", "title_keyword": "lego creationary", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/lego-creationary/", "summary": "How quickly can you guess what’s being built from LEGO bricks? {"title": "Paperboy: Special Delivery", "title_search": "paperboy special delivery", "title_keyword": "paperboy special delivery", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/paperboy-special-delivery/", "summary": "A veritable classic from the golden age of video gaming returns to a new route on the iPhone/smartphone/mobile platform! The arcade game you remember from the 80's has been brought back to life with updated graphics and a new Story Mode with more forgiving game-play mechanics. As the Paperboy, you'll fight for customers against the enigmatic "Grifter." Successfully deliver papers to the customers on your route, scoring bonus points for landing papers directly in their mailbox. You'll have plenty of obstacles to contend with along the way: avoid dogs, cars, burglars, breakdancers, trash cans, runaway lawnmowers and more! As you play through the story, you'll acquire different skills and abilities - like yo-yo and multi-paper throws - to get help you through challenging areas. Pay attention for clues as the story unfolds - will you get the girl? Who are the mysterious paper barons trying to muscle in on your turf? All will be revealed in this humorous, nostalgic and faithful re-creation of the 80's classic!  Features:  - An update that retains the humor and core gameplay of the original 80's stand-up arcade classic  - Easy controls make pick-up-and-play a snap: turn left/right, speed up/slow down, throw papers.   - Funny, engaging storyline set in the 80s, supported by new obstacles, gameplay enhancements and characters. 20 story levels in all!  - A NEW, easier STORY Mode in addition to CLASSIC Mode - just like the original!  - Refined artwork and graphics make for a deeper, richer and more 3D experience than ever before.  - Develop your paperboy character by unlocking 10 special skills and abilities in Story Mode such as the yo-yo throw or multi-paper throw.  - Hit bullseye deliveries and other obstacles to get higher scores and dominate the global leaderboards.  - Special Halloween theme in the story mode. Trick unsubscribers by smashing their windows!
